WorkItem.Description:
Archdrood said to go to filters and "enable" special currency. It appears everything is correct in my filters. Not to be an idiot, but I would appreciate it is someone could be even more specific about what I am looking for under filters.
Â 
Thank you.
WorkItem.Summary: Still can't get T10 Bloodmage gear to show T10 lvl 251

Comments.Message: look to the comparisons box on the right side of the window. there is a tab at the top for filters. open that up and look for the check box for special currencies and check it to be on.
Thank you! I was looking under the wrong filters section. :)
